mapper.insert: insert into post (title, contents, category_no, reg_date) values(#{title}, #{contents}, #{categoryNo }, now())
mapper.select: select post.no, title, contents, category_no as categoryNo, date_format(reg_date, '%Y/%m/%d') as regDate from post join category where category.no = post.category_no and category.blog_id = #{blogId} order by post.reg_date desc limit 0, 5;

select post.no, title, contents, category_no as categoryNo, date_format(reg_date, '%Y/%m/%d') as regDate from post join category where category.no = post.category_no and category.blog_id = #{blogId} and category_no = #{categoryNo} order by post.reg_date desc limit 0, 5;
